decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The use hereby permitted shall be for a limited period of 2 years from the date of this permission.

REASON: A permanent development would be inappropriate in light of prevailing circumstances
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 
Site Location Plan; 18/3484/1 (Site Plan Existing); 18/3484/1 Revision C (Site Plan Proposed); Supporting Statement.

REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. 
Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted shall not open to customers outside of the following  times: -
a)	09:00 to 20:00 hours, Monday to Sunday
REASON: To safeguard the amenities of neighbouring properties and ensure the proper functioning of the commercial properties within the locality, in accordance with policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Local Policies Plan 2013.
Condition : 4 - No sewage or trade effluent, including cooling water containing chemical additives, or vehicle washing water, including steam cleaning effluent, shall be discharged to the surface water drainage system.
Car wash liquid waste is classed as trade effluent. Before discharging to a sewer you must always obtain a trade effluent consent or enter into a trade effluent agreement with your water and sewerage company or authority. If you are not able to discharge effluent to the foul sewer it will be classed as waste and you must then comply with your duty of care responsibilities. More information regarding the discharge of trade effluent can be found at www.netregs.gov.uk and
http://publications.environment-agency.gov.uk/pdf/PMHO0307BMDX-e-e.pdf

REASON:
To prevent pollution of the water environment in accordance with policy 5.14B of The London Plan (2011).
Condition : 5 - Within one month of the decision notice the canopy structure shall be relocated to the location shown on drawing numbered 18/3484/1 Revision C (Site Plan Proposed).

REASON: To safeguard the amenities of neighbouring properties and ensure the proper functioning of the commercial properties within the locality, in accordance with policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Local Policies Plan 2013.
description: Change Of Use Of Car Park (Sui Generis) To Car Wash (including canopy structure) (Sui Generis); (Retrospective)
